apiKeysDescription: Manage API keys for integrating DynoPay into your applications

documentation.title: API Documentation
documentation.description: Learn how to integrate DynoPay into your application with our complete API documentation

delete.title: Delete API key
delete.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? Applications using this key will no longer be able to access the API. This action cannot be undone.

security.title: Security Best Practices:
security.description: Keep your API keys secure and never share them publicly. If you suspect a key has been compromised, delete it immediately and create a new one.

generate.modalSubtitle: Generate a new API key to integrate DynoPay into your app
generate.successSubtitle: Save this key now - you won't be able to see it again
generate.securityMessage: Make sure to copy your API key now. For security reasons, we won't show it again. Store it securely and never share it publicly.

withdrawalWhitelist.title: Withdrawal Whitelist
withdrawalWhitelist.description: Once enabled, your account will only be able to withdraw to addresses on your whitelist.
